p: Daily data of mean surface air temperature and near-surface relative humidity from multi-model simulations ( Table 1) for the Coupled Model Inter-comparison Project Phase 5 (CMIP5) were used in this study, which can be available from the Earth System Grid Federation (ESGF) ( https://esgf-index1.ceda.ac.uk/search/cmip5-ceda/). All the data were interpolated to a common 0.5Â° grid cell size using a bilinear function. We used one run (rli1p1) for each model.
